content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: orange_bed
inventory=[{"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "blue_banner", "quantity": 3, "index": 13}, {"type": "mushroom_stem", "quantity": 30, "index": 17}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "orange_tulip", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "ice", "quantity": 44, "index": 31}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 14, "index": 32}, {"type": "cow_spawn_egg", "quantity": 27, "index": 39}, {"type": "tnt_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "light_blue_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 3, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft orange_bed, I need to craft orange_dye. To craft orange_dye, I can use the orange_tulip at slot 26, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: orange_bed
inventory=[{"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "orange_tulip", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "blue_banner", "quantity": 3, "index": 13}, {"type": "mushroom_stem", "quantity": 30, "index": 17}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "ice", "quantity": 44, "index": 31}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 14, "index": 32}, {"type": "cow_spawn_egg", "quantity": 27, "index": 39}, {"type": "tnt_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "light_blue_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 3, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that the orange_dye has been crafted, I will move it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: orange_bed
inventory=[{"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "blue_banner", "quantity": 3, "index": 13}, {"type": "mushroom_stem", "quantity": 30, "index": 17}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "ice", "quantity": 44, "index": 31}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 14, "index": 32}, {"type": "cow_spawn_egg", "quantity": 27, "index": 39}, {"type": "tnt_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "light_blue_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 3, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft orange_bed, I need to place the orange_dye and white_bed side by side in the crafting grid, so I will move the orange_dye to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
